name: Ninja Shippude
description:
Hire Ninja characters you remember and adventure in the best real-time ninja fighting game

Game Feature
3D scene turn based role playing game
You will be in 3D world and meet with a variety of familiar ninja characters, including their original CV.
Experience the original classic battle in 3D game world and enjoy the gorgeous ninja skills.

Wonderful Story
Your Ninja Team will face all kinds of challenges in the original, which will remind you of the whole story line. Protect your village. Witness friendship, friendship and dream.

Famous Ninja Characters
All the 50 Ninja characters in the original will be on the stage. You will be able to lead all of them into a Ninja Team, whether they are friends or enemies. There are all kinds of Genjutsu, Ninjutsu and Taijutsu. From the initial form to the ultimate.

A Variety of Ways to Develop Characters
Upgrade your ninja level and star level. Collect and build various kinds of ninja tools to strengthen the power of your Ninja Team. Your team power is growing day by day, and to record the growth of the bit by bit with your ninja team members.
Classic scene Online
Win the crown in the Ninja Arena, climb the Ninja tower and defeat the Rogue Ninja leader. Even including the Ninja exam war and Ninja tower, can you survive in the end?
